records.csfb__Query__c:
SELECT blng__EndDate__c, Name, blng__Quantity__c, blng__StartDate__c,
blng__Subtotal__c, blng__TotalAmount__c, blng__UnitPrice__c,
blng__Product__r.ProductCode,
blng__OrderProduct__r.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.LPCR_ContactEnfant__r.Name,
blng__OrderProduct__r.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.LPCR_CongesJours__c,
blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__r.Name,
blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__r.LPCR_TypeCreche__c,
blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingCity,
blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingPostalCode,
blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingStreet,
blng__OrderProduct__r.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.LPCR_ContractEntreprise__r.Account.Name
FROM blng__InvoiceLine__c
WHERE blng__Invoice__c = '{pv0}' AND blng__Product__r.ProductCode LIKE 'Berceau%'
AND blng__OrderProduct__r.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.LPCR_ContactEnfant__c != null
AND blng__OrderProduct__r.LPCR_Creche__c != null
ORDER BY blng__EndDate__c DESC LIMIT 1

records.csfb__Description__c: Created By Solution Pack for Composer Solution: Generate Invoice (blng__Invoice__c)
records.csfb__Query__c:
SELECT blng__Account__r.Name,
blng__Account__r.LPCR_IdSage__c,
blng__Account__r.LPCR_NumeroAllocataire__c,
blng__Account__r.Owner.FirstName,
blng__Account__r.Owner.LastName,
blng__Account__r.LPCR_ResponsableADV__r.LastName,
blng__Account__r.LPCR_ResponsableADV__r.FirstName,
blng__Account__r.BillingCity, blng__Account__r.BillingCountry, 
blng__Account__r.BillingState, blng__Account__r.BillingStreet, 
blng__Account__r.BillingPostalCode  FROM blng__Invoice__c WHERE Id = '{pv0}'

records.csfb__Description__c: notes de crédit allouées aux lignes de factures
records.csfb__Query__c: SELECT Id, blng__InvoiceLine__r.blng__Invoice__c, blng__CreditNoteLine__r.blng__Notes__c, blng__CreditNoteLine__r.blng__CreditNoteLineDate__c, blng__ImpactAmount__c, LPCR_TypeEvenement__c, blng__CreditNoteLine__c FROM blng__CreditNoteAllocation__c WHERE blng__InvoiceLine__r.blng__Invoice__c = '{pv0}' AND blng__CreditNoteLine__r.blng__CreditNote__r.blng__CreditNoteSourceAction__c = 'Manual'

records.csfb__Description__c: notes de débit allouées aux lignes de factures
records.csfb__Query__c: SELECT Id, blng__InvoiceLine__r.blng__Invoice__c, blng__DebitNoteLine__r.blng__Notes__c, blng__DebitNoteLine__r.blng__DebitNoteLineDate__c, blng__ImpactAmount__c, blng__DebitNoteLine__c FROM blng__DebitNoteAllocation__c WHERE blng__InvoiceLine__r.blng__Invoice__c = '{pv0}' AND blng__DebitNoteLine__r.blng__DebitNote__r.blng__DebitNoteSourceAction__c = 'Manual'

records.csfb__Description__c: Requête utilisée pour le conga batch de génération des factures
records.csfb__Query__c: SELECT Id FROM  blng__Invoice__c WHERE LPCR_StatutFacture__c = 'A Envoyer'

records.csfb__Description__c: Lignes de factures avec Liens Familles factures
records.csfb__Query__c:
SELECT blng__Balance__c, LPCR_DesignationProduit__c, LPCR_Creche__r.Name, blng__BalancewithoutDebits__c,
blng__CalculatedQuantity__c, blng__ChargeDate__c,
blng__Credits__c, blng__Debits__c, blng__DebitsPaymentAllocations__c,
blng__DebitsPaymentUnallocations__c, blng__EndDate__c, blng__GroupedQuantity__c,
blng__OrderProduct__c, Name, blng__OrderProduct__r.SBQQ__Contract__r.LPCR_NumeroContrat__c, blng__Quantity__c, blng__StartDate__c,
blng__Subtotal__c, blng__TaxAmount__c, blng__TotalAmount__c, blng__UnitPrice__c, LPCR_PrixUnitaireProratise__c,
blng__Product__r.ProductCode, LPCR_PrixUnitaireManuel__c,blng__Invoice__r.LPCR_NombreJoursUtilisation__c,(Select Id, LPCR_Facture__c, LPCR_ContratFamille__c,
LPCR_ContratFamille__r.LPCR_NumeroContrat__c,
LPCR_ContratFamille__r.Account.Name,
LPCR_ContratFamille__r.Account.LPCR_InformationsFacture__c,
LPCR_ContratFamille__r.LPCR_Creche__r.Name,
LPCR_ContratFamille__r.LPCR_ContactEnfant__r.Name, Tech_InformationsFamille__c from LPCR_Liens_Familles_et_Factures__r)
FROM blng__InvoiceLine__c
WHERE blng__Invoice__r.Id = '{pv0}' AND blng__Subtotal__c <> 0 ORDER BY blng__Subtotal__c DESC
SELECT Id FROM blng__Invoice__c WHERE LPCR_StatutFacture__c = 'A Envoyer' AND id = 'a1o3O000000VULbQAO'

Select ID, LPCR_NbHeuresRealise__c, blng__Balance__c, Tech_MaxDateLigneBerceauFamille__c, Tech_MinDateLigneBerceauFamille__c,
LPCR_Creche__r.Name , LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingStreet, LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingCity, LPCR_Creche__r.ShippingPostalCode,
LPCR_ContactEnfant__r.Name
FROM blng__Invoice__c
WHERE blng__Account__c = '{pv0}' AND Tech_MaxDateLigneBerceauFamille__c <= {pv1} AND LPCR_ContactEnfant__c='{pv2}'
ORDER BY Tech_MaxDateLigneBerceauFamille__c DESC LIMIT 1

records.csfb__Description__c: montant de la participation CAF dans le cas d'une famille en crèche MAC
records.csfb__Query__c: SELECT SUM(LPCR_ParticipationCAF__c) ParticipationCAF FROM blng__InvoiceLine__c WHERE blng__Invoice__c = '{pv0}'
